PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-10792015-07-16,  ,  HC,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations (Tapentadol)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS (TAPENTADOL) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians and decrease potential diversion and abuse by controlling tapentadol in a manner that is consistent with similar opioids like morphine, hydromorphone and oxycodone.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0189 Publication Date: 2015-07-29
AttachmentsAttachment
